mapper.insert: INSERT INTO userdto(user_id, user_pw, user_name, user_address, user_email, user_phone, user_role) VALUES(#{id}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{address}, #{email}, #{phone}, "ROLE_USER")
mapper.select: SELECT user_uid uid, user_id id, user_pw pw, user_name name, user_address address, user_email email, user_phone phone FROM userdto WHERE user_id = #{id}
